title: Document lightweight runtime-v2 operations runbook
description: Write a compact operator runbook covering daily health checks, key logs, common failure symptoms, and quick recovery commands for runtime-v2.

title: Tune wake trigger thresholds after real usage
description: After canary data is collected, tune wake threshold/cooldown/rearm values to reduce false triggers while preserving responsiveness.

title: Canary runtime-v2 soak and monitor health metrics
description: Run runtime-v2 for a short canary period, monitor runtime-status-json and runtime-health-check outputs, and capture any regressions in command/dictation/wake flows.
